mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp( emp_id, ct_no, cust_no, dept_id, job_no, emp_no, pw, emp_name, hire_dt, emp_stat, emp_addr1, emp_tel, email_addr ) SELECT cust_no || '000' , #{ctNo} , cust_no , #{deptId} , #{jobNo} , '000' , #{pw} , rep , SYSDATE , '1D1d' , SUBSTR(cust_addr, -6, 5) , cust_tel , cust_no||'000@'||cust_no||'.yedam' FROM cust where cust_no = #{custNo}
mapper.select: SELECT cur_emps , max_emps FROM ct WHERE cust_no = #{cno}

SELECT e.emp_id ,e.emp_no ,e.emp_name ,e.dept_id ,get_deptname(e.dept_id) as dept_name ,e.job_no ,j.job_title ,j.perm_id ,get_codename(j.perm_id) as perm_name ,e.hire_dt ,e.emp_stat ,get_codename(e.emp_stat) as emp_stat_name ,e.emp_addr1 ,e.emp_addr2 ,e.emp_addr3 ,e.emp_addr4 ,e.emp_tel ,e.email_addr ,e.fire_dt FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN jobs j ON (e.job_no = j.job_no) WHERE emp_id = #{eid}
AND e.cust_no = #{cno}
